layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x328
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x328
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x300
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 253x19
          text run at (0,0) width 253: "The two blocks below should be identical:"

        LayoutText {#text} at (27,27) size 72x72
          text run at (27,27) width 72: "X X"
          text run at (27,75) width 72: "X X"
      LayoutBlockFlow {PRE} at (12,174) size 126x126 [color=#00FFFF] [bgcolor=#008080] [border: (3px solid #000080)]
        LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 120x120
          text run at (3,3) width 120: "     "
          text run at (123,3) width 0: " "

          text run at (123,27) width 0: " "
